chapters.title: Rites of Passage
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar goes on a trip of initiation with his son. Meanwhile, he thinks he has finally found a way to sail ships to the west. However, his beliefs are seen as insane so he chooses to go against the law.

chapters.title: Wrath of the Northmen
chapters.synopsis: The stage is set for the first journey west by Ragnar Lothbrok as he gathers a crew willing to risk their lives to travel into the unknown.

chapters.title: Dispossessed
chapters.synopsis: After his successful raid, Ragnar and his crew joyously return home with their riches. Earl Haraldson doesn't hesitate to summon Ragnar to the great hall where he lays claim to the entirety of the treasure. He allows the crew to take one thing from the hoard and Ragnar selects Brother Athelstan as his slave. From Athelstan, he learns the political structure in England and wants to learn some of the language.

chapters.title: Trial
chapters.synopsis: The Vikings head back to England to see what other treasures this new world has to offer. This go round Ragnar and his crew sail out with Earl Haraldson's permission.

chapters.title: Raid
chapters.synopsis: In the Great Hall of Kattegat, a seer reads Earl Haraldson's future and tells him that Ragnar Lothbrok searches for his death.

chapters.title: Burial of the Dead
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar, weak and still hurt, must meet the Earl head-on after it comes to light that Rollo has been tortured on Haraldson's orders.

chapters.title: A king´s Ransom
chapters.synopsis: Three Viking ships sail upriver towards the very heart of power in eastern England: the Royal Villa of King Aelle.

chapters.title: Sacrifice
chapters.synopsis: The traditional pilgrimage to Uppsala to thank the gods brings a torrent of emotions for Ragnar, Lagertha, and Athelstan.

chapters.title: All Change
chapters.synopsis: At the behest of King Horik, Ragnar assembles a small party to travel to Gotaland (modern day Sweden) to resolve a land dispute with the area's leader, Jarl Borg.

chapters.title: Brother´s War
chapters.synopsis: The battle begins between Ragnar and King Horik's forces against Jarl Borg. Borg is joined by Rollo, and this Viking clash pits brother against brother.

chapters.title: Invasion
chapters.synopsis: Four peaceful years have since passed with Ragnar as Earl. The time has come for an unlikely alliance to band together in pursuit of a common goal - a new raid on England. A storm pushes the Viking fleet to a new destination, and on the beaches of Wessex, Ragnar and his men may have met their match.

chapters.title: Treachery
chapters.synopsis: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

chapters.title: Eye for an Eye
chapters.synopsis: A meeting between two great men may pave the way for future compromise as Ragnar and Ecbert come face to face. Jarl Borg now rules Kattegat and with an iron fist and Rollo must now become the leader his people need in Ragnar's absence.

chapters.title: Answers in Blood
chapters.synopsis: Lagertha and Ragnar unite once again; Aslaug must face the truth of her prophecies; Athelstan struggles to define his faith; Bjorn must once again make a choice.

chapters.title: Unforgiven
chapters.synopsis: King Horik returns to Kattegat with a surprising proposition for Ragnar; Lagertha runs into a less than enthusiastic homecoming from her new husband; Athelstan becomes confidant to King Ecbert.

chapters.title: Blood Eagle
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar and King Horik clash over differences; King Aelle arrives in Wessex; Ecbert has an eye on a new alliance.

chapters.title: The Choice
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar's warriors march on to King Ecbert's villa and are met with a vicious surprise.

chapters.title: The Lord´s Prayer
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar returns to Kattegat after the defeat in Wessex and places his trust in those who have stayed by his side all this time.

chapters.title: Mercenary
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar and Lagertha's fleets depart Kattegat once more for Wessex but this time they bring settlers.

chapters.title: The Wanderer
chapters.synopsis: Lagertha and Athelstan help to set up the Viking settlement; a mysterious wanderer turns up.

chapters.title: Warrior´s Fate
chapters.synopsis: King Ecbert visits the developing Viking settlement as the first harvest is sown.

chapters.title: Scarred
chapters.synopsis: There is bitterness in the camp, Floki is angry over the alliance with Ecbert.

chapters.title: The Usurper
chapters.synopsis: The fleet returns to Kattegat to discover tragic circumstances await.

chapters.title: Born Again
chapters.synopsis: Preparations for the Paris raid pick up speed, and Rollo thinks about the Seer's prophecy.

chapters.title: Paris
chapters.synopsis: The Viking fleet causes panic in Paris; the Emperor Charles declares he will remain in the city.

chapters.title: To the Gates!
chapters.synopsis: The Viking army sets out and Paris goes into lockdown as the army prepares the defense.

chapters.title: Breaking Point
chapters.synopsis: The Vikings hit Paris with a second assault; Emperor Charles has to make a difficult decision.

chapters.title: The Dead
chapters.synopsis: With one last chance to take Paris, Ragnar and his Viking troops take a daring chance. Ragnar asks Bjorn for a favor that could change the course of Viking history.

chapters.title: A Good Treason
chapters.synopsis: As Ragnar lies in his sick bed in Kattegat, events unfold beyond his control.

chapters.title: Kill the Queen
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar and Floki are still at odds; Rollo makes great attempts to win over his new bride, Princess Gisla; Bjorn's survival skills are put to the test; King Ecbert sets the task for his son Aethelwulf to rescue Queen Kwenthrith.

chapters.title: Mercy
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar tells Floki he has to pay a heavy price for his actions. Rollo finds an ally in Count Odo. Bjorn Ironside finds more than he bargained for in the wilderness.

chapters.title: Yol
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar gets to know the new slave woman while Rollo reveals his ambitions to his wife. Bjorn meets an unexpected warrior on his way home.

chapters.title: Promised
chapters.synopsis: Halfdan the Black arrives in Kattegat. Floki reveals a secret to Finehair. Ragnar and Yidu become closer. Meanwhile Lagertha settles a score.

chapters.title: What Might Have Been
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar reveals his plan to raid Paris again, and although the fleet is storm-tossed as it sets out, the challenge lies in Frankia where Rollo awaits. Meanwhile, Ecbert dispatches Aethelwulf and Alfred on a pilgrimage to Rome.

chapters.title: The Profit and the Loss
chapters.synopsis: Now aware that Rollo has betrayed him, Ragnar carries out his plan of attack, which has dire consequences. Ecbert is given an offer from Prince Wigstan of Mercia. Harbard causes a stir with the women of Kattegat.

chapters.title: Portage
chapters.synopsis: After facing defeat on the river, Ragnar refuses to retreat, prompting him to change his methods of attacking Paris. Count Odo's plot against Charles and Rollo backfires. Ecbert now rules Mercia, which dissatisfies Kwenthrith.

chapters.title: Death All ´Round
chapters.synopsis: The Vikings finally reach the river. Aethelwulf and Alfred reach Rome. Erlendur makes his move against Bjorn. Sigurd makes a shocking discovery in Kattegat. Ecbert is crowned king in Mercia.

chapters.title: The Last Ship
chapters.synopsis: A ferocious battle between the Vikings and the Franks eventually comes down to Ragnar against Rollo. The outcome will seal the fate of the two brothers.

chapters.title: The Outsider
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar has returned to Kattegat where he devises a plan to return to Wessex to right past wrongs.

chapters.title: The Vision
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar seeks to equip his voyage to Wessex, even while being warned that the gods have deserted him. Bjorn prepares to fulfill his dream of exploring the Mediterranean.

chapters.title: Two Journeys
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar and Ivar face a difficult decision in regards to their crew; Bjorn has an unexpected reunion.

chapters.title: In the Uncertain Hour Before the Morning
chapters.synopsis: Lagertha attempts to fulfill a long-held ambition; Ragnar negotiates an unexpected concession from King Ecbert.

chapters.title: All His Angels
chapters.synopsis: King Aelle can't hide his pleasure when Ragnar arrives in a cage and shows him no mercy.

chapters.title: Crossings
chapters.synopsis: Bjorn's fleet sails onward and launches a surprise attack. Back in Kattegat, Lagertha continues in her quest for power.

chapters.title: The Great Army
chapters.synopsis: The Great Army is gathering in Kattegat, as Lagertha is saved by Bjorn Ironside from the hands of Ragnar's sons. Rollo is establishing the kingdom of Normandie as a safe-heaven for all vikings in search for land.

chapters.title: Revenge
chapters.synopsis: Ragnar's plan comes to fruition; the Viking army lands on the coast of Northumbria.

chapters.title: On the Eve
chapters.synopsis: The Viking army causes panic in the English countryside as King Ecbert and Aethelwulf plan the defense of the Kingdom of Wessex.

chapters.title: The Reckoning
chapters.synopsis: Prince Aethelwulf finds himself subject to the Vikings' battle master plan; Ecbert remains behind with a plan of his own.
